article_title: Q&A: Malia Jones digs into data to find a counterintuitive trend on poverty

og.description: An assistant scientist and social epidemiologist for the University of Wisconsin-Madison Applied Population Laboratory, Jones published an analysis showing that the economic recovery hasn't affected everyone.
